personal_information.name: Dobromir Stoyanov
personal_information.about_me:
As a detail-oriented and innovative Front-End Developer, I possess over one year of dedicated experience in developing responsive, user-centric web applications. Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, my expertise extends to transforming complex design concepts into functional website components. My entry into front-end development was propelled by a rigorous, self-taught regimen and specialized coursework, underscoring my commitment to continuous learning and excellence.

I excel in leveraging modern web technologies to craft seamless user experiences, demonstrating a deep understanding of user interface design and development principles. My proficiency in React and React Native enables me to create compelling web and mobile applications, emphasizing optimal user engagement through well-styled pages that adhere to the latest UX guidelines.

Passionate about pushing the boundaries of web technology, I am committed to contributing to projects that enhance user interaction and satisfaction, driving forward the goals of a forward-thinking development team.

project_description: iClinic is a comprehensive healthcare management system designed to help managing a cosmetic clinic. It provides a wide range of features, including appointment scheduling, patient management, and inventory management, to streamline the clinic’s operations and enhance patient care.
projectResponsibilities: Designing and implementing a highly intuitive and user-friendly front-end for the iClinic healthcare management system, leveraging React to align with the aesthetic and functional requirements of cosmetic clinics.
Building responsive and accessible UI components for features such as appointment scheduling and  patient management, ensuring a seamless experience across desktop and mobile devices.
Integrating RESTful APIs for real-time data exchange between the iClinic front-end and backend services, enabling up-to-date patient information and appointment schedules.

project_description: Reloaders is a premier mobile app for Android and iOS, designed to effortlessly connect shooting enthusiasts with local ranges. It simplifies bookings and range management while also serving as a one-stop online shop for shooting accessories. This app enhances the shooting experience by streamlining the search and reservation process, and providing range owners with a powerful tool to manage their facilities and engage with customers.
projectResponsibilities: Developing a custom UI based on client-provided designs, tailored specifically for the Reloaders app to ensure a seamless and engaging user experience.
Engineering high-quality, responsive, and accessible UI components, optimized for both Android and iOS platforms, to cater to the diverse needs of shooting enthusiasts and range owners.

Creating custom hooks, reusable components, and sophisticated business logic to meet the unique requirements of the Reloaders platform, thereby facilitating efficient bookings, management, and access to a comprehensive selection of shooting accessories.

project_description: eSimatic emerged as a groundbreaking mobile application, strategically envisioned to transform the global telecommunications landscape by revolutionizing how eSIMs are distributed, sold, and managed. The application was developed with the foresight to tap into the burgeoning demand for a more agile, secure, and user-friendly method of managing mobile carrier services in an era where physical SIM cards are becoming obsolete.
projectResponsibilities: Creating a custom UI provided by the client’s designs
Develop high-quality, responsive, and accessible UIs components
Creating custom hooks, reusable components and business logic to match the client’s requirements

project_description: BNC was a dedicated communication platform designed specifically for first responders, enabling seamless chat messaging and video calls among emergency personnel. This powerful app enhances real-time collaboration, coordination, and decision-making in critical situations.
projectResponsibilities: Developed and implemented functionalities for creating new conversations between users.
Adjusted functionalities related to conversation management for seamless chat messaging, including editing conversations and adding or deleting users from them.
Created functionalities for creating and managing groups in the BNC App.
Implemented adjusted group functionalities for both the client and admin parts of the application.
Collaborated with the development team to integrate work effectively.
projects.project_outcome: The successful development and implementation of the BNC App will result in several significant outcomes, revolutionizing communication and collaboration among first responders in emergency situations.

jobDescription: As a meticulous and innovative front-end developer, I bring over an year of focused experience in crafting responsive, user-focused web and mobile applications. My expertise spans HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, with a foundation built on a self-directed learning journey and targeted coursework. I am adept at transforming design blueprints into functional, dynamic web components, driven by a passion for utilizing the latest web technologies to enhance user experience. My proficiency extends to developing both React and React Native applications, with a keen eye for implementing UX principles to style web pages effectively. My approach combines technical skill with a creative mindset to push the boundaries of web development.

projectResponsibilities: Translating business requirements into compelling designs
Conducting user research and applying industry best practices
Designing intuitive and engaging user interfaces
Conducting usability testing and iterating designs
Collaborating with clients, project managers, and developers

training.name: SoftServe Academy - ReactSelfPaced
training.description: Practical skills for the development of SPA using ReactJS - JSX syntax, working with requests and Promises, splitting an application into components, using React Router, Hooks, Context API, Redux Toolkit, Material UI, linters, React Hook Form

training.name: Software Univesity 2021: ReactJS
training.description: Knowledge of Single Page Applications using ReactJS - JSX syntax, working with requests and Promises, splitting an application intocomponents, routing and validating  forms, React Hooks and the Context API

training.name: Software Univesity2021 JS: Basic to Advanced
training.description: Gained a solid foundation in JavaScript, covering syntax, variables, functions, and DOM manipulation. You have advanced to more complex topics like asynchronous programming, closures, and modular programming.
